org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl

Class SimpleGBLTrajAliDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl.SimpleGBLTrajAliDriver

  • public class SimpleGBLTrajAliDriver
extends Driver
    A Driver which refits tracks using GBL. Does not require GBL collections to be present in the event.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver
